cab.content: HIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTVS GOVERNMENT jPrinted for the Cabinet. March 1946.SECRET.CP. (46) 133.mh March, 1946.Copy No.38CABINET.COMMITTEE ON PREPARATIONS FOR THE MEETING OFDOMINION PRIME MINISTERS.Note by the Secretary.THE Prime Minister has approved the appointment of a Committee to supervise the preparations for the Meeting of Dominion Prime Ministers next month.The Committee will be composed as follows : Secretary of State for Dominion Affairs (Chairman).Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs (or his representative).Secretary of State for the Colonies.Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for India.General Sir Hastings L. Ismay (representing the Minister of Defence).The Joint Secretaries of the Committee will be : 'Mr. C. G. Eastwood (Cabinet Office).The Hon. F. E. Cumming-Bruce (Dominions Office).(Signed) E. E. BRIDGES.Cabinet Office, S.W. 1,29th March, 1946.[31561]
